short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension pops the current video to a floating window and allows you to continue watching it while using other applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Picture-in-Picture floats the current video to a small window so you can watch it while using other applications. Best for watching tutorial videos.
